javadoc:
A dialog that controls the panels for going to "Next" and "Previous" in some
 process that the user is being led through.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: modal
params.comment: true if the wizard should be modal

params.name: pmgr
params.comment: object that knows about the next and previous panels

methods.name: <init>

params.name: modal
params.comment: true if the wizard should be modal

params.name: pmgr
params.comment: object that knows about the next and previous panels

params.name: wizardIcon
params.comment: icon to use for this dialog

methods.javadoc:
Returns the current status message being displayed in this dialog.
@return the current status message being displayed in this dialog
methods.name: getStatusMessage
methods.comment: Returns the current status message being displayed in this dialog.

return.comment: the current status message being displayed in this dialog

methods.javadoc:
Display this dialog and parent it to the given component.
@param parent parent
methods.name: showWizard
methods.comment: Display this dialog and parent it to the given component.

methods.name: completed
methods.comment: Notification that the wizard process is complete.

methods.javadoc:
Enable the next, previous, and finish buttons according to the
 panel manager for this dialog. The panel manager is the object that
 knows the steps in the process and what buttons should be
 enabled.
methods.name: enableNavigation
methods.comment:
Enable the next, previous, and finish buttons according to the
 panel manager for this dialog. The panel manager is the object that
 knows the steps in the process and what buttons should be
 enabled.

methods.javadoc: Disable the back, next, finish, and cancel buttons.
methods.name: disableNavigation
methods.comment: Disable the back, next, finish, and cancel buttons.

methods.javadoc:
Programmatically move the wizard back one panel.
 Simulates the user clicking on the 'back' button.
 Returns true if not on the first panel.
@return true if not on the first panel
methods.name: back
methods.comment:
Programmatically move the wizard back one panel.
 Simulates the user clicking on the 'back' button.
 Returns true if not on the first panel.

return.comment: true if not on the first panel

methods.javadoc:
Programmatically move the wizard forward one panel.
 Simulates the user clicking on the 'next' button.
 Returns true if not on the last panel.
@return true if not on the last panel
methods.name: next
methods.comment:
Programmatically move the wizard forward one panel.
 Simulates the user clicking on the 'next' button.
 Returns true if not on the last panel.

return.comment: true if not on the last panel

methods.name: finish
methods.comment:
Programmatically finished the wizard task.
 Returns true if the wizard can finish.

return.comment: true if the wizard can finish

methods.javadoc:
Returns the current wizard panel.
@return the current wizard panel
methods.name: getCurrentWizardPanel

methods.javadoc:
Sets the current wizard panel.
@param p the current panel
methods.name: setCurrentPanel

name: WizardManager
comment:
A dialog that controls the panels for going to "Next" and "Previous" in some
 process that the user is being led through.
